version_description:
• The music player now has a brand new look. It's fast, stable and looks fresh and new. We've added smoother animations, the ability to swipe between playlists as well as share songs on both your wall and in a private message.
• We've updated our masks to make them easier to use. There are dozens of different looks to choose from. Add one to your story to bring it to life. You’ll have all the masks on hand.
• The app has been adapted for iPhone X.

• The music player now has a brand new look. It's fast, stable and looks fresh and new. We've added smoother animations, the ability to swipe between playlists as well as share songs on both your wall and in a private message.
• We've updated our masks to make them easier to use. There are dozens of different looks to choose from. Add one to your story to bring it to life. You’ll have all the masks on hand.
• The app has been adapted for iPhone X.
Improvements and bug fixes
Improvements and bug fixes

• A new screen for viewing live streams: instantly comment and subscribe to streamers, send stickers and gifts, watch interesting streams from provided suggestions.

• Support has never been closer as now you can get help using the mobile app's new section. We've added answers to popular questions as well as the ability to restore profile. If the list doesn't include a certain question, just send it to our agents.

• A new screen for viewing live streams: instantly comment and subscribe to streamers, send stickers and gifts, watch interesting streams from provided suggestions.

• Support has never been closer as now you can get help using the mobile app's new section. We've added answers to popular questions as well as the ability to restore profile. If the list doesn't include a certain question, just send it to our agents.

• Added support for mobile AMP so that you can read articles with ease with reduced data usage. Instantly download news items and pages of external sites that use this technology, such links are marked with a lightning badge.
• New document search. Quickly find what you need when searching your personal files and other documents.
• Implemented dozens of improvements and prepared the application for important future updates.

• Added support for mobile AMP so that you can read articles with ease with reduced data usage. Instantly download news items and pages of external sites that use this technology, such links are marked with a lightning badge.
• New document search. Quickly find what you need when searching your personal files and other documents.
• Implemented dozens of improvements and prepared the application for important future updates.
Improvements and bug fixes
Improvements and bug fixes

• We've added the ability to report pages. Now you can submit complaints against pages that distribute spam or violate other rules. We review all reports immediately upon reception to ensure that VK is comfortable to use.

• You can now send VK invitations. Invite your friends to register on VK via a special link created in the Find Friends section.

• We've added the ability to report pages. Now you can submit complaints against pages that distribute spam or violate other rules. We review all reports immediately upon reception to ensure that VK is comfortable to use.

• You can now send VK invitations. Invite your friends to register on VK via a special link created in the Find Friends section.

Improved notifications. Now, you can immediately respond to notifications within the app. For example, you can reply to a message or accept a friend request. If the notifications are viewed on the computer, they will disappear from your phone

Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

• Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example, chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them.

• Added a convenient way to get to VK from other applications. When you tap on a VK link, the desired section will open in the app.

• Completely changed the text editor in Stories. You can now use new fonts and colors, backgrounds for your text, fast alignment and a slider to adjust the font size.

• Integrated quick rewind and fast-forward functions into the videos in the news feed. If you tap twice on the left or right sides of the video player screen, the video will jump 10 seconds back or forward.

• Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example, chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them.

• Added a convenient way to get to VK from other applications. When you tap on a VK link, the desired section will open in the app.

• Completely changed the text editor in Stories. You can now use new fonts and colors, backgrounds for your text, fast alignment and a slider to adjust the font size.

• Integrated quick rewind and fast-forward functions into the videos in the news feed. If you tap twice on the left or right sides of the video player screen, the video will jump 10 seconds back or forward.

• Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example, chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them.

• Added a convenient way to get to VK from other applications. When you tap on a VK link, the desired section will open in the app.

• Completely changed the text editor in Stories. You can now use new fonts and colors, backgrounds for your text, fast alignment and a slider to adjust the font size.

• Integrated quick rewind and fast-forward functions into the videos in the news feed. If you tap twice on the left or right sides of the video player screen, the video will jump 10 seconds back or forward.

• Updated the Messages section inside and out. For example, chats now open on the first unread message and a user can delete their messages for everyone in a chat for 24 hours after sending them.

• Added a convenient way to get to VK from other applications. When you tap on a VK link, the desired section will open in the app.

• Completely changed the text editor in Stories. You can now use new fonts and colors, backgrounds for your text, fast alignment and a slider to adjust the font size.

• Integrated quick rewind and fast-forward functions into the videos in the news feed. If you tap twice on the left or right sides of the video player screen, the video will jump 10 seconds back or forward.
We're continuing to improve stability and increase the speed of our services.
We're continuing to improve stability and increase the speed of our services.

• Edit messages
Did you make a clumsy typo? Don’t worry, everyone makes mistakes. Correct your misspellings and let others be none the wiser. If anyone in the chat edits their message, the word “edited” will appear next to it.

• Watch videos on Apple TV.
Big screens, big impressions. Stream videos from the VK player to Apple TV using AirPlay. Watch your favorite clips and live streams right on the TV.

• Collect money for group purchases.
Now, in private conversations and chats, you can create money transfers to buy your friend a present or chip in for the bill at a cafe. It's as easy as sending a message.

Bug fixes
Bug fixes
We're continuing to improve stability and increase the speed of our services.
We're continuing to improve stability and increase the speed of our services.

• Play games without downloading and installing
Thanks to the Direct Games platform, any game from the catalog can be played right in the app.

• Publish stories with 2 masks
Masks for everyone! Now you and your friends can try on masks together. Sometimes one mask just isn’t enough.

• Play games without downloading and installing
Thanks to the Direct Games platform, any game from the catalog can be played right in the app.

• Publish stories with 2 masks
Masks for everyone! Now you and your friends can try on masks together. Sometimes one mask just isn’t enough.

• Mention friends in chats. Just type "@" in your message and select the person you need from the list of chat members. When you send your message, that person will receive an instant notification about it.

• Open specific messages right from chat search results. You can now easily bring up a conversation thread or find out how your question was answered.

• Search in a new way! We updated the search function in the app's Discover section to make finding friends, communities or news more convenient. You might find exactly what you're looking for right in the suggestions we provide.

• Publish your favorite photos and videos in stories. Whether you took them today, a week ago or even earlier, time is no longer a factor. Your friends won’t miss your beautiful vacation pics or that funny video you took when you went out last weekend.

• Disable comments on specific posts. There are times when you want to share important news with the world but are not in the mood to read through comments. Now you can simply disable comments when making a post.

Polls 2.0 — Eye-catching and easy-to-use, with a bunch of new features.

• Add a colored background to make your poll unique and noticeable. Choose from the pictures offered or upload one yourself.

• Set up multiple answer questions and get the most accurate results from your poll.

• Create polls directly in chats. You and your friends can now vote right in your group chat on where to meet up on the weekend or what film to watch tomorrow night.

• Specify how long the poll lasts. When the time is up, no one else can participate or change their vote. Ideal for contests.

• Receive notifications when friends take part in your poll and instantly find out the results when voting is over.

Polls 2.0 — Eye-catching and easy-to-use, with a bunch of new features.

• Add a colored background to make your poll unique and noticeable. Choose from the pictures offered or upload one yourself.

• Set up multiple answer questions and get the most accurate results from your poll.

• Create polls directly in chats. You and your friends can now vote right in your group chat on where to meet up on the weekend or what film to watch tomorrow night.

• Specify how long the poll lasts. When the time is up, no one else can participate or change their vote. Ideal for contests.

• Receive notifications when friends take part in your poll and instantly find out the results when voting is over.

• Pin messages in chats.
Chat members will never miss important information such as useful links, meeting places and travel times.

• Send chat invite links.
Users who started a conversation can copy a unique chat invitation link in the chat info section. Instantly create a group chat for you and your colleagues, classmates or friends.

• Minimize calls during the conversation.
You can use all of the app’s functions, such as messaging, browsing communities or checking your news feed, all while carrying on a call.

• Search communities for posts.
No bit of news will be left behind. Did you suddenly remember an interesting post and want to show it to your friends? Now you can go to the community you remember seeing it in and find it by searching some key words.

• Track your profile statistics.
If you have over 100 followers, you’ll be able to find out general information about the sex, age and location of your page’s visitors. You’ll also be able to see their activity, such as the number of likes or comments.

• Share photos faster.
Send pics to your friends or post them on your community without tiring your fingers out. The "Share" button is right there when looking at your pictures.

• Have all new messages right at hand.
Tap “Messages” and choose “Unread” to see your unread chats on one screen.

• Send stickers to friends.
Sometimes stickers speak louder than words. Express yourself with ease! Stickers now load even quicker.

Bug fixes
Bug fixes

• Talk to your friends face to face
Now it’s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What’s more, thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation, you can now turn your phone whichever way you'd like during video calls.

• Send stories to chats
Create a story and tap “Choose recipients”. There used to only be a list of friends, but now there are group chats as well.

• Talk to your friends face to face
Now it’s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What’s more, thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation, you can now turn your phone whichever way you'd like during video calls.

• Send stories to chats
Create a story and tap “Choose recipients”. There used to only be a list of friends, but now there are group chats as well.

• Talk to your friends face to face
Now it’s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What’s more, thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation, you can now turn your phone whichever way you'd like during video calls.

• Send stories to chats
Create a story and tap “Choose recipients”. There used to only be a list of friends, but now there are group chats as well.

• Talk to your friends face to face
Now it’s even easier to switch to video calling while talking with your friends on VK. What’s more, thanks to newly added support for landscape orientation, you can now turn your phone whichever way you'd like during video calls.

• Send stories to chats
Create a story and tap “Choose recipients”. There used to only be a list of friends, but now there are group chats as well.

• Enjoy watching videos in the updated player
The video player is now more beautiful and easy to use. Fast-forward or rewind by double-tapping on the right or left sides of the screen, adjust the video speed and enable full-screen mode with one gesture. The player now supports subtitles and provides video recommendations.

• Find friends without opening the app
Just type your friend’s name into the search field on your phone’s home screen to find their VK profile quickly and easily.

• VK on iOS 12
Adapted the app to the updated operating system.

Bug fixes
Bug fixes

• Meet the new Bookmarks
Save interesting posts, articles, videos and other content to check out later. You’ll be able to quickly find what you need in the new Bookmarks section. And with the help of tags, you’ll be easily able to group content together in whichever way suits you the best.

• More “Reply” button features
Now you can attach anything from stickers to songs when replying to messages, and with one tap, you are able to go to the message you replied to.

• Meet the new Bookmarks
Save interesting posts, articles, videos and other content to check out later. You’ll be able to quickly find what you need in the new Bookmarks section. And with the help of tags, you’ll be easily able to group content together in whichever way suits you the best.

• More “Reply” button features
Now you can attach anything from stickers to songs when replying to messages, and with one tap, you are able to go to the message you replied to.

• Switch to our stellar dark mode
Chat comfortably any time of the day with our stylish dark design reducing the stress on your eyes. Tap on “Appearance” in the app settings to switch between modes.

Easily free up space on your phone by using the new “Clear cache” function in Settings.

Photos from messages and the news feed are cached, which allows them to appear instantly. Sometimes, though, free space is what really matters.

• Share interesting content with one tap
Share photos, videos and much more by tapping the share icon and selecting which chats you want to send them to.

• Get a sneak peek of the chat with 3D Touch
Pressing on a chat name a bit harder than usual will allow you to see the last few messages without opening the chat.

• Share interesting content with one tap
Share photos, videos and much more by tapping the share icon and selecting which chats you want to send them to.

• Get a sneak peek of the chat with 3D Touch
Pressing on a chat name a bit harder than usual will allow you to see the last few messages without opening the chat.

• Listen to voice messages in a new player
Now you can listen to messages and use other sections of the app at the same time. You can also adjust their playback speed, and if you received several messages, they’ll play automatically one after the other.

• Keep order in your chats
Chat administrators can now delete other members’ messages. As before, messages from chat creators or other administrators can’t be deleted.

• Listen to voice messages in a new player
Now you can listen to messages and use other sections of the app at the same time. You can also adjust their playback speed, and if you received several messages, they’ll play automatically one after the other.

• Keep order in your chats
Chat administrators can now delete other members’ messages. As before, messages from chat creators or other administrators can’t be deleted.

QR codes make life so much easier. Within seconds, you can share links to interesting communities, profiles and content. These codes can be used anywhere. Show them to your friends or print them out for people to scan at events and places around town.

If you see a QR code, use the in-app camera’s new QR scanner function to scan it. We’ve added easy access to the scanner at the top of both the Recommendations and Friends sections. On the app, you’ll be able to create QR codes for your profile or posts as well.

Fully immerse yourself in voice messages. Just open a chat, hold your phone up to your ear, and voice messages will start playing one after the other. If you haven’t listened to a message yet, there’ll be a blue dot by the play button to let you know.

Fully immerse yourself in voice messages. Just open a chat, hold your phone up to your ear, and voice messages will start playing one after the other. If you haven’t listened to a message yet, there’ll be a blue dot by the play button to let you know.

• Customize comment order

• We made it possible to search for chat members and messages right in your chats. This feature works even if you have a slow internet connection.
• We updated our QR code scanner. Now it can recognize QR codes in photos that you have on your device. You can open the scanner from your story camera or in the second tab in the bottom menu.
• The app has been adapted to iOS 13. For example, if you enable dark mode in your phone settings, it is automatically applied on VK.

• We made it possible to search for chat members and messages right in your chats. This feature works even if you have a slow internet connection.
• We updated our QR code scanner. Now it can recognize QR codes in photos that you have on your device. You can open the scanner from your story camera or in the second tab in the bottom menu.
• The app has been adapted to iOS 13. For example, if you enable dark mode in your phone settings, it is automatically applied on VK.

Do you ever find multiple QR codes right next to each other? Now you don’t have to bring your phone closer or adjust your camera’s focus to scan one of them. Just open your QR Scanner in the app camera and tap the code you want after it’s detected.

• Add stickers to your favorites
Tired of constantly scrolling to find that one sticker you always use? Tap and hold it to open a menu where you can save the sticker to your favorites.

• Send messages even with a poor internet connection
Whether you’re in the subway, elevator or countryside, messages sent when your internet is slow are now more likely to find their recipients.

• Your favorite chats at hand on iOS 13
Did you take a cool picture or found something interesting on another app? Just tap “Share” and your most frequently used VK chats will be the first to appear.

The redesigned VK super app is now available to all!

• Next to your news feed, you’ll find the Discover section, with recommended content and thematic feeds.
• Your profile and Friends are in separate tabs. Everything you need to find people and share content is right at your fingertips.
• Swipe left on your profile to open the side menu containing Settings.

Check out the new music recommendations! In the “For You” tab, you’ll find two playlists: one offers a new selection of tracks every day, and the other updates once a week. Both of them are created based on your tastes.

As a nice bonus, the music you’re listening to can now be streamed in your community’s status. Organize cozy online parties, and create a warm atmosphere for your followers!

Two major updates: we’ve added support for iOS 14 and launched VK Health.

The VK Health platform will help you learn more about your body and start developing good habits. And your friends can help! Ask them for support, compete, share your achievements and reach your goals together. The platform can encourage you to quit smoking, remind you to take your medicine and give you tips on how to relieve stress through breathing exercises.

More features and expert advice will be gradually added to VK Health. For example, you’ll soon have access to a leaderboard displaying the number of steps you and your friends have taken, with steps counted through synchronization with Apple Health. Go out and see who can walk the most!

The Messages section is now Messenger. This new name more accurately reflects the service’s features, as it’s not only used to send messages but make calls, transfer money and share music, photos, videos and documents as well.

Added new familiar messenger features:
• Chat with people from your phone’s contacts on VK by syncing them with the app.
• Add custom backgrounds to chats. Choose one of the default ones or upload an image.

Now you can choose whether you want chat members’ names to come from their VK profiles or your phone’s contact list. Just sync your contacts or enable the option in your settings.

That way, if you have your friend as “Platypus” on your phone, they’ll show up that way on VK too.

New features have been added to the VK Health platform. Now you can record what you eat and keep track of symptoms if you’re not feeling well.

• Food Diary
Log your meals, and this service will break down how many calories and macronutrients, such as fat, carbs or protein, you’re consuming.

• Symptom Tracker
If you feel sick, start keeping track of any symptoms you have, such as a fever, loss of smell, or cough. All symptoms are displayed in the service’s calendar, giving your doctor the full picture of the illness and when it started.

Meet the newest addition to thematic feeds: a tab for football fans. Here, you can find the latest news straight from the stadiums, live streams of matches, expert analysis and comments from official club and team communities.

You can scroll through it or check out other thematic feeds on topics such as science, travel or movies. All you have to do is go to the News tab and start swiping left until you reach the feed you want.

Snowflakes melt fast — but not the ones on our icon! Update the app and enjoy a bit of winter magic every time you see them. Ring in the New Year with funny predictions and end-of-the-year statistics. And don’t forget to wish your loved ones happy holidays on VK!

We introduced two updates to the messenger:

• Smart unread message counter
You can now set the unread message counter to only show the number of unread messages from chats with notifications enabled. You can do this in your settings: Settings → Account → Messenger.

• Searching for voice messages
Instantly find the voice message you’re looking for. Words you search for are highlighted, and transcribed text is easy to copy. This can come in handy when you want to respond to a specific point.

We introduced two updates to the messenger:

• Smart unread message counter
You can now set the unread message counter to only show the number of unread messages from chats with notifications enabled. You can do this in your settings: Settings → Account → Messenger.

• Searching for voice messages
Instantly find the voice message you’re looking for. Words you search for are highlighted, and transcribed text is easy to copy. This can come in handy when you want to respond to a specific point.
We got rid of a bunch of bugs that you reported.
We got rid of a bunch of bugs that you reported.

Notifications about people leaving old chats won’t bother you anymore. An automatic message will still appear in the chat when someone leaves, but the number of unread messages won’t increase, and the chat won’t move up in your chat list. This applies to chats with more than 10 members or ones that no one has written in for at least a week.

Now you can edit voice messages. Did background noise mess up the transcription? It’s easy to fix! Just open the transcription, press and hold it to open the menu and select Edit text. You can edit the transcription within 24 hours of sending the voice message.

Now you’ll be able to see if someone is trying to send you a photo or video, just like with text and voice messages. There will no longer be any awkward silences while files are uploading.

It was time to do some spring cleaning, so the first things we threw out, of course, were some bugs.

Now you’ll be able to see if someone is trying to send you a photo or video, just like with text and voice messages. There will no longer be any awkward silences while files are uploading.

It was time to do some spring cleaning, so the first things we threw out, of course, were some bugs.

Introducing updates to Stories and Messenger.

• Now you can add up to a hundred stories to a narrative. They’ll be displayed on your profile and won’t disappear after 24 hours. Go ahead and share all of the most amazing stories from your vacation.

• Voice messages of up to 30 minutes can now be transcribed. Now, when you don’t have time to listen to a large voice message, you can just read it. This also makes it easier to find the message by searching for any word in its text.

Introducing the new universal app for iPhone and iPad. Now music, video calls, clips and other VK features are available on your tablet as well. Update the app and bring out the big screen!

Main updates for iPad:
• Music and notifications right in the bottom menu. Playlists and notifications are just one tap away.
• Stories, clips and videos. And with that big screen of yours, you won’t miss any details.
• Spacious messenger. See a list of your chats on the left, and write messages on the right. You can hook up your external keyboard and type out long, detailed messages, or if you’re rushed for time, just send a voice message.
• Video calls for work, study and casual chatting. See everyone and everything on the big screen!

Tap and hold to access quick actions:

• Open the app appearance menu by tapping and holding the app mode button. Here, you can set the mode to change depending on the time, match the iOS mode and select chat backgrounds for the messenger.
• Search for messages in a chat by tapping and holding the chat name. Enter a phrase you remember to find the message you’re looking for, even if it’s a voice message.
• Add tracks attached to posts to your music or queue them up by tapping and holding them.

Tap and hold to access quick actions:

• Open the app appearance menu by tapping and holding the app mode button. Here, you can set the mode to change depending on the time, match the iOS mode and select chat backgrounds for the messenger.
• Search for messages in a chat by tapping and holding the chat name. Enter a phrase you remember to find the message you’re looking for, even if it’s a voice message.
• Add tracks attached to posts to your music or queue them up by tapping and holding them.
